attributes.action: Stop vulnerable people Going outside and reinforce this by offering help
attributes.additional_details: I am very concerned about the effects of the measures in place. We don’t need to stop young, healthy people from working. We need to stop vulnerable people from catching the virus. The more of them do, the more will die, the more pressure on the NHS, the more stringent measures put in place and the more danger to the economy. The simplest way is to prevent more deaths is to isolate those at risk. The elderly. Utilise the people losing their jobs to provide for the elderly.
attributes.background: The virus is killing mostly elderly people. We have to do everything to stop it from getting to them. But the elderly are leaving their homes to do their shopping, banking, etc. We need to stop this. Mobilise the people out of work to supply essentials and help with any need that involves going out.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the Government has imposed a number of restrictions on individuals and businesses as a result of the coronavirus outbreak, including a requirement that most people, including the vulnerable, stay at home. You can find out what you can and can't do here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-outbreak-faqs-what-you-can-and-cant-do/coronavirus-outbreak-faqs-what-you-can-and-cant-do 

If you want the Government to consider closing down offices and businesses and ordering home working, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301439 

If you want the Government to close all businesses that are not vital, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308122 

If you want the Government to implement a complete lockdown, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310805 

If you want the Government to close all shops including supermarkets, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310341 

If you want the Government to close all unnecessary businesses including takeaways, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307294 

If you would like the Government to close all non-essential online stores and warehouses, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311765
